item.title: Nix Ci on Github
item.description: This brain dump is split into two parts. The first part is there to remind us of the goals we want to achieve with our CI-system. The second part proposes some guidelines that support us in reaching these goals. Part 1: Goals Link to heading This is a list of goals that we want to achieve with our CI system. The goals are not ordered by priority or any other particular way.
